languages.text: "Нет, ибо каждому зеркалу присущ свой изъян непохожести".

traits.locale_text: "Нет, ибо каждому зеркалу присущ свой изъян исказительный".

languages.text: "No, for every mirror has its own defect that flaws the resemblance."
languages.original_text: "Нет, ибо каждому зеркалу присущ свой изъян непохожести".

traits.locale_text: "No, for every mirror has its own defect that flaws the resemblance."

languages.text: «No, puesto que cada espejo tiene un defecto que altera el parecido».
languages.original_text: "No, for every mirror has its own defect that flaws the resemblance."

traits.locale_text: «No, puesto que cada espejo tiene un defecto que altera el parecido».

languages.text: « Non, car chaque miroir comporte son propre défaut qui gâte la ressemblance. »
languages.original_text: "No, for every mirror has its own defect that flaws the resemblance."

traits.locale_text: « Non, car chaque miroir comporte son propre défaut qui gâte la ressemblance. »

languages.text: 「いや、どの鏡であっても、鏡像を損なう歪みがあるというものだ」
languages.original_text: "No, for every mirror has its own defect that flaws the resemblance."

traits.locale_text: 「いや、どの鏡であっても、鏡像を損なう歪みがあるというものだ」

languages.text: “不一样，因为每面镜子都有各自的瑕疵，会让倒影变得不同。”
languages.original_text: "No, for every mirror has its own defect that flaws the resemblance."

traits.locale_text: “不一样，因为每面镜子都有各自的瑕疵，会让倒影变得不同。”

languages.text: "Nein, denn jeder Spiegel hat seine eigenen Fehler, die das Spiegelbild beeinträchtigen."
languages.original_text: "No, for every mirror has its own defect that flaws the resemblance."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, denn jeder Spiegel hat seine eigenen Fehler, die das Spiegelbild beeinträchtigen."

languages.text: "Hayır. Nihayetinde her aynanın, benzerliği kusurlu hâle getiren kendi kusurları vardır."
languages.original_text: "No, for every mirror has its own defect that flaws the resemblance."
